ComicInfo.Summary: The Feast of the Cannibal Dolls!: Sara and Vampirella follow a trail of vampires being harvested for their flesh to a modeling agency full of supermodel cannibals, and a photographer who is staying eternally young by draining their life force.
ComicInfo.Title: The Feast of the Cannibal Dolls!
